Title: Relates to the disposition of net revenues of regional off-track betting corporations to participating counties
Summary: Provides that the disposition of net revenues of regional off-track betting corporations to participating counties may be divided on an annual, bi-annual or quarterly basis as determined by such corporations.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the disposition of net revenues of regional off-track betting corporations to participating counties
